name: Rapidev DMCC
description:
Rapidev DMCC is a Dubai based company, with a sister company Rapidev Pvt Ltd in Islamabad, Pakistan dealing with high tech ICT equipment and consultation with turnkey solutions. Rapidev DMCC is having highly experience team of Consultants, Engineers and Technicians.

Technical Capabilities:
Consultation
System Engineering
System Design and Development
Software Design Service
Sourcing of Electronics Parts and Components Contract Manufacturing
Trainings
PCB Design and Fabrication
specialties: java, web development, android, pcb design, component sourcing, PCB fabrication, Cloud services, Provision of IoT Hardware for researchers, Contract manufacturing, and IoT Bootcamp training
